message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $140. It's a great deal and I'm sure you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I can only pay up to $130 for the product. Looking forward to your response.

Hi Bob, I understand your position. While $130 is a good offer, I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my initial price.  How about $135? I believe this is still a good deal for you, considering the value of the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. However, I'm still unable to meet you at $135. My maximum budget remains $130. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
